channel.title: CNN.com - RSS Channel - App International Edition
channel.description: CNN.com delivers up-to-the-minute news and information on the latest top stories, weather, entertainment, politics and more.

image.title: CNN.com - RSS Channel - App International Edition

channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2020 Turner Broadcasting System, Inc. All Rights Reserved.

item.title: One church, so many deaths: Pastor says 44 parishioners killed by Covid-19 reveal a troubling truth
Doctors treating coronavirus patients are seeing odd and frightening syndromes
item.description: The patient had been relatively fine for the first 10 days he was down with Covid-19.

item.title: Biologist says to avoid these places to protect against Covid-19
item.description: University of Massachusetts Dartmouth Biology Professor Erin Bromage tells CNN's John Berman which environments have an increased risk of spreading coronavirus.

item.title: Ousted US vaccine chief will warn Congress of potential for 'darkest winter in modern history'
2020 has been a tourism catastrophe. These places have been hit hardest
US warns China is launching cyberattacks to steal coronavirus research
item.description: The US Department of Homeland Security and the FBI are expected to issue a formal warning that China is launching cyberattacks to steal coronavirus data related to vaccines and treatments from US research institutions and pharmaceutical companies, according to a US national security official.

item.title: Packed Tube trains embody the UK's confused coronavirus response
item.description: As thousands of people returned to work across England on Wednesday morning, images of packed London Underground trains have sparked fresh criticism of the government's strategy for easing the country's seven-week lockdown.

item.title: Russia epidemic worsens. Maker of remdesivir strikes deals to let other companies produce the drug internationally.
Thousands of people want to be exposed to Covid-19 for science
item.description: Abie Rohrig had just turned 18 when he told his mom he would be donating a kidney to save a stranger's life. Her answer: No you're not. He did it anyway -- the organ went to a man about his age -- and his mom was so inspired she went and donated a kidney herself.

item.title: Germany is finding a unique way back to nightlife
item.description: Germany's cultural institutions are making a comeback, but the way people visit museums and enjoy nightlife has been changed by the Covid-19 pandemic. Business owners have adopted strict hygiene and social distancing guidelines in a bid to fend off the virus. CNN's Fred Pleitgen reports.

item.title: Finally, the Supreme Court can tell Trump he's not above the law
Joe Biden's running mate list is shorter than you might think -- for now, at least
Five surfers die after huge layer of sea foam hampers rescue
item.description: Five surfers who knew the sea "like the back of their hand" have died after a huge layer of foam in the water hampered efforts to rescue them.

item.title: Which airlines are flying where, and why?
Former Trump campaign chairman Paul Manafort released from prison due to coronavirus concerns
item.description: Former Trump campaign chairman Paul Manafort was released from prison Wednesday following a request by his lawyers due to the coronavirus pandemic, his attorney Kevin Downing said.

item.title: White House clarifies there is no talk of altering Election Day after Kushner remarks
Your next flight may cost 50 percent more. Here's why
item.description: Airlines are having to develop their own safety guidelines for social distancing as flights bookings increase. CNN's Pete Muntean reports.

item.title: The generation that will be hit the hardest by the financial fallout from coronavirus
113-year-old speaks out about surviving coronavirus
item.description: A 113-year-old woman, thought to be the oldest in Spain, has said she feels fine after surviving a brush with coronavirus.

item.title: 'Coronavirus slayer' puts Indian state in lead of Covid-19 fight
Grocery prices are soaring. Here's what's getting more expensive
'Gray nomads' hit coronavirus speed bump
item.description: For many retired Australians, home is not always a fixed address.

item.title: GOP sen. tells Fauci he isn't the 'end all.' See his response
item.description: Dr. Anthony Fauci warned against claims that children are immune to coronavirus, citing new cases where some children have developed a mysterious inflammatory syndrome that could be linked to the virus.

item.title: Breaking down 'Obamagate,' Trump's latest theory about the 'deep state' and Obama's role in the Russia investigation
item.description: President Donald Trump and his allies added a new dimension this week to their "deep state" conspiracy theory, directly accusing former President Barack Obama of leading a supposed "coup" to sabotage the Trump presidency.

item.title: Trump and right-wing media distract from bad virus news with alternate reality
item.description: A version of this article first appeared in the "Reliable Sources" newsletter. You can sign up for free right here.

item.title: Toobin identifies most important moment from Trump's Supreme Court case
item.description: CNN's Kate Bouldan speaks to legal analysts about the Supreme Court's consideration of how far Presidential immunity extends into the case of Trump's financial records.

item.title: California officials capitulate to Elon Musk, allow Tesla plant to reopen
item.description: Tesla's standoff with California's Alameda County officials has come to an end after the county agreed to let Tesla's factory in Fremont, California, reopen.

item.title: Covid-19 baffles doctors with mysterious symptoms
item.description: CNN's Dr. Sanjay Gupta highlights how Covid-19 is baffling doctors, seemingly triggering a number of health issues and mysterious symptoms all over the body.

item.title: Hong Kong is pushing a controversial national anthem bill just as protests are kicking off again
item.description: After five months of being at the forefront of the coronavirus pandemic, new infections in Hong Kong have slowed to a trickle, and the city is slowly getting back to normal. Which, these days, means protests.

item.title: Man refusing to wear mask breaks arm of store employee
item.description: Two men were arrested for felony battery after starting a fight with employees at a Los Angeles Target store over wearing masks inside the store.

item.title: Tekashi 6ix9ine's attempt to donate $200,000 to No Kid Hungry rejected
item.description: Tekashi 6ix9ine looks to be doing well financially since his release from prison and apparently wants to share the wealth.

item.title: Roll the tape: Trump's pattern of insulting female reporters
item.description: CNN's Alisyn Camerota, Kaitlan Collins and Abby Phillip discuss President Donald Trump's pattern of demeaning female reporters.

item.title: Yes, you still need to wear sunscreen indoors — here's why
item.description: If you're fortunate enough to work from home during the coronavirus pandemic, then you've probably got your morning beauty routine on lock by now. You wash your face, hydrate your skin and apply your no-fail makeup products (if you're choosing to wear makeup at all) before you hop on your morning video chat with your co-workers.

item.title: Matt Damon discusses life under lockdown in 'fairytale' Irish town
item.description: Matt Damon has revealed that his daughter tested positive to Covid-19 in New York City, while he and the rest of his family have spent lockdown in Ireland.

item.title: 'I have a lot of regrets': Tennis champion opens up about her crippling shyness
item.description: Two grand slam titles and a rapid rise to the top of world tennis was a head-spinning ascent for Naomi Osaka.

item.title: Photographer known for mass nude shots takes his art online
item.description: American artist Spencer Tunick is best known for bringing hundreds -- and sometimes thousands -- of participants together to pose for striking mass nude photographs.

item.title: Sumo wrestler, 28, is sport's first coronavirus death
item.description: A 28-year-old Japanese sumo wrestler has died from health complications after contracting coronavirus, the first in the sport to fall victim to Covid-19.

item.title: NBA has a new CEO in China. His first task is to make up with Beijing
item.description: The NBA has a new chief in China, but he faces a tough road ahead as the league continues to deal with fallout from an ugly political storm last year.

item.title: Embalming secrets of ancient Egypt revealed
item.description: Archeologists excavating a burial chamber near Cairo have discovered ancient Egyptian embalmers were savvy business people that lured customers in with special deals to suit their budget.

item.title: Adam Sandler's daughter crashes interview
item.description: Comedian and actor Adam Sandler's interview on "Jimmy Kimmel Live" included a special appearance by his daughter, who shared a minor grooming accident that happened to her father.

item.title: Midwives face fear and new challenges as the coronavirus spreads in Africa
item.description: When midwife Philomena Owusu Domfe gets up for work every day she is scared.

item.title: Kristen Bell says she was sassed while homeschooling her kids
item.description: Actress and "Frozen" star Kristen Bell shares the relatable challenges she faces while homeschooling her daughters.

item.title: Executive mom: I was already juggling a lot, then Covid-19 hit
item.description: On March 14, it began with just a headache and fatigue. I'm a 39-year-old mom of two small children and work as an executive at a start-up company, so if I'm tired and my head hurts, it's not a cause for concern -- it's just regular life.

item.title: Lingerie is changing. Here's why
item.description: From Vivienne Westwood's Victorian corsetry to Calvin Klein's bias-cut slips, lingerie has always had a place on the runway.

item.title: New York pastor says coronavirus has killed 44 people in his parish. He warns that this reveals a troubling truth.
Calls to anti-violence helpline increased 73% in Italy
DC extends stay-at-home order to June 8
Dow futures point higher on hopes for bailout
This generation will be worst-hit by coronavirus
item.description: • Prices tumble at an alarming rate • UK economy sees historic drop. Much more pain is to come • Modi promises $266B to protect economy

item.title: Putin's coronavirus crisis deepens
